MAN.TITLE: oldbessel
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Modified Bessel functions of the first kind (I sub alpha).
Modified Bessel functions of the first kind (J sub alpha).
Modified Bessel functions of the second kind (K sub alpha).
Modified Bessel functions of the second kind (Y sub alpha).

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : real vector with non negative entries
: real vector with non negative entries regularly spaced with increment equal to one alpha=alpha0+(n1:n2)

DESCRIPTION.P: these functions are obsolete, use besseli, besselj, besselk, bessely instead. Note however that the semantics of these two functions are different.
oldbesseli(alpha,x) computes modified Bessel functions of the first kind (I sub alpha), for real, non-negative order alpha and real argument x.
oldbesselj(alpha,x) computes modified Bessel functions of the first kind (J sub alpha), for real, non-negative order alpha and real argument x.
oldbesselk(alpha,x) computes modified Bessel functions of the second kind (K sub alpha), for real, non-negative order alpha and real argument x.
oldbessely(alpha,x) computes modified Bessel functions of the second kind (Y sub alpha), for real, non-negative order alpha and real argument x.
alpha and x may be vectors. The output is m-by-n with m = size(x,'*'), n = size(alpha,'*') whose (i,j) entry is oldbesseli(alpha(j),x(i)).
If ice is equal to 2 exponentialy scaled Bessel functions is computed (I_alpha_scaled(x) = exp(-x) I_alpha(x)).
